mapper.sql: id, req, res, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert:
insert into my_admin.sys_system_log(req, res, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.req}, #{entity.res}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into my_admin.sys_system_log(req, res, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.req}, #{entity.res}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update req = values(req) , res = values(res) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , is_delete = values(is_delete)
